Package com.atakmap.android.video.manager

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VideoManager.Listener
    Listener for add/remove events
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    VideoContentHandler  
    VideoContentResolver  
    VideoFileWatcher
    Thread which watches for changes to the /atak/tools/videos directory XXX - I chose not to use FileObserver here because they generally aren't reliable across systems and like to fire tons of events without much rhyme or reason, which would end up impacting performance
    VideoManager
    Class responsible for managing video aliases persisted to the filesystem
    VideoXMLHandler
    Handles serialization and deserialization of connection entry XML
